data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismer, Lee, Ahmad, Norhayati, Onn, Chan Kin (2009): A new, diminutive, upland Sphenomorphus Fitzinger 1843 (Squamata: Scincidae) from the Belum-Temengor Forest Complex, Peninsular Malaysia. Zootaxa 2312: 27-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275409
